name: npc_dota_hero_windrunner
bio_loc: The western forests guard their secrets well. One of these is Lyralei, master archer of the wood, and favored godchild of the wind.  Known now as Windranger, Lyralei's family was killed in a storm on the night of her birth--their house blown down by the gale, contents scattered to the winds. Only the newborn survived among the debris field of death and destruction.  In the quiet after the storm, the wind itself took notice of the lucky infant crying in the grass. The wind pitied the child and so lifted her into the sky and deposited her on a doorstep in a neighboring village.  In the years that followed, the wind returned occasionally to the child's life, watching from a distance while she honed her skills.  Now, after many years of training, Windranger fires her arrows true to their targets.  She moves with blinding speed, as if hastened by a wind ever at her back.  With a flurry of arrows, she slaughters her enemies, having become, nearly, a force of nature herself.
hype_loc: Evasive and swift, the nimble Windranger is always seeking the right angle to attack. Whether she's clearing the way with a draw of her deadly powershot, or shackling enemies together to pepper them with arrows, she's always on the move.
npe_desc_loc: Fires swift flurry of arrows at a single target

facets.description_loc: Shackleshot affects more enemies and grants damage per unit shackled.
facets.name: windrunner_tangled

facets.description_loc: Powershot executes low health enemy heroes.
facets.name: windrunner_killshot

abilities.name: windrunner_shackleshot
abilities.desc_loc: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to %fail_stun_duration%.
abilities.lore_loc: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
notes_loc: This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.
Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most %shackle_distance% behind the target.
facets_loc: Shackleshot applies to all units and trees behind the target unit and grants Windranger bonus attack damage for each additional shackled unit and tree. Creeps and trees grant less bonus damage.

abilities.name: windrunner_powershot
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to %abilitychanneltime% second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages and slows enemies' movement speed along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage and slow is reduced.
abilities.lore_loc: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
notes_loc: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.
facets_loc: Enemy heroes hit are executed if below a health threshold. The execute threshold is based on the arrow's power.

abilities.name: windrunner_windrun
abilities.desc_loc: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks.
abilities.lore_loc: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
notes_loc: Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.
abilities.scepter_loc: Windrun reduces physical damage taken by %physical_damage_pct%%%, and grants invisibility that is not broken by attacking or casting spells.
facets_loc: Windrun grants additional bonus movement speed to Windranger and nearby allies.

abilities.name: windrunner_gale_force
abilities.desc_loc: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.
abilities.lore_loc: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.

abilities.name: windrunner_focusfire
abilities.desc_loc: Windranger channels the wind to gain %bonus_attack_speed% additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
abilities.lore_loc: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
notes_loc: Issuing a Hold Position command will pause Windranger's attacks.
facets_loc: Focus Fire no longer requires a target, instead firing at random enemies within Windranger's attack range + %bonus_range%. Fires a fixed number of attacks per second, and can only hit the same enemy every 4 shots. Prioritizes Heroes.

abilities.name: windrunner_easy_breezy
abilities.desc_loc: Windranger's movement speed cannot be lower than %min_movespeed% and can reach %max_movespeed%.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_windranger_2
talents.name_loc: Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by {s:bonus_cooldown_reduction_per_kill}s
talents.desc_loc: Triggers if Focus Fired unit dies, regardless of killer.
